meanings.definition: Consisting of more than one molecule.
meanings.sent1: The multimolecular structure of the compound made it very stable.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the multimolecular interactions between the different substances.
meanings.sent3: The party was a multimolecular mix of friends from various circles.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a multimolecular blend of colors and textures.
meanings.sent5: The multimolecular bond between the atoms was incredibly strong.

meanings.sent1: The multimolecular reaction required precise measurements of each component.
meanings.sent2: The drug had a multimolecular composition that targeted specific cells.
meanings.sent3: The recipe called for a multimolecular combination of ingredients for the perfect cake.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a multimolecular masterpiece of flowers and herbs.
meanings.sent5: The multimolecular structure of the crystal lattice was fascinating to observe.
